comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
Michael J. Ryan, President of the United Irish League.

He is too old to be:
Michael J. "Mike" Ryan (January 1, 1889 – December 27, 1971) was an American track and field athlete and a member of the Irish American Athletic Club. He was a distance runner and competed in the Marathon for the U.S. Olympic team in the 1908 Summer Olympics and 1912 Summer Olympics, but did not finish either race.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks Richard Arthur Norton. Here's another photo of Michael Ryan taken at a later date: www.loc.gov/pictures/item/ggb2006004154 We'll fill in the caption on this photograph and the date the next time we update the record.
